Shrapnel was hit by the fireball. He gasps loudly and changed to robot mode=
. Chop Shop changed as well, hearing the shots coming, but in mid change he=
 is hit by a fireball. He is blasted forward and slides through the sand, l=
eading an in motion print of his body. Shrapnel charges up a lightning blas=
t and fires it at Apocalypse.

Bombshell sends a signal to Periwinkle, tell=
ing her to run straight into Virgo's blade...

  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, Febru=
ary 21, 2002 3:13 AM
  Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?=
...


  McGowan stares. She was sick of waiting.

  McGowan: 8 9 10!

  McG=
owan punches Brown in the jaw and throws him to the ground so Chop Shop and=
 Shrapnel can start their feast. Brown didn't move though. Since no one was=
 bothering to help him, he decided to accept his death even though he horri=
fied of death, especially by being eaten.

  Virgo: Uh...

  Virgo looks at=
 Depp's kitana. She stares at the long slightly curved blade, sticking to t=
he side and up a little. She smiles.

  Virgo: Make her run and throw herse=
lf onto the blade!

  Virgo points to the kitana.

  Lee fires 2 fireballs =
towards the chivtron base. Barrymore fires at the chivtron base 5 times. Bi=
rdbot's grenades click and both explode. The fiery blaze rockets towards th=
e chivtron base. Papertron fires 2 missiles towards the chivtron base.

  P=
apertron: FER!...

  McGowan: Hear this Shitrons! Whip out the barbeque sau=
ce! Because you Shitrons have never been deader!...

  McGowan turns to wat=
ch Chop Shop and Shrapnel feast on Brown as well as to see Periwinkle perfo=
rm her trick after being given the command...
    ----- Original Message --=
--- 
    From: Narrator 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, =
February 17, 2002 3:09 AM
    Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chi=
vtrons?...


    Bombshell: What next?

    Chop Shop transform to beats mo=
de, so does Shrapnel. The autoguns shoot Shrapnel right in the ass and make=
 him run forward...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: *Orchi=
d* 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, February 17, 2002=
 12:34 AM
      Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


 =
     OOC: Airly, you better reply to those shots soon. I don't care if you =
don't want to lose, I'm sick of your moding!!

      IC:

      Periwinkle =
stares and starts crapping. A large pile of crap now sits on the ground. Sh=
e turns, dropping to her knees. She buries her face in the pile and starts =
eating away.

      McGowan: Hear this you shit eaters! Get out here and fi=
ght!

      Virgo was in a laughing spell, pointing to Periwinkle. The othe=
rs, too, could not help but laugh.

      McGowan: And, now! You will come =
out by the time I count to 10, or Brown will be ingested and digested!...1.=
...2....3....4....5.....6.....7......

        ----- Original Message -----=
 
        From: Narrator 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent:=
 Saturday, February 16, 2002 8:03 AM
        Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can =
you dig it, Chivtrons?...


        Bombshell: Of course!

        He sends=
 a signal to the cerebro shell in Periwinkle's head, it tells her to crap a=
nd eat it.

        Bombshell: Nobody has as much fun as me...

          -=
---- Original Message ----- 
          From: *Orchid* 
          To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 7:55 AM
     =
     Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


          Mc=
Gowan: Hmm...You got a point there....He is shit....Well, think it over and=
 let me know.

          Brown was quite relieved that nothing happened yet=
. McGowan then whispered to him.

          McGowan: Don't be so relaxed...=
.Any chivtron in my hands is sure to die....

          Periwinkle dances a=
round like a fool. She does the mambo and also dances like Rikishi Phatu.

=
          Virgo and the others laugh.

          Virgo: Make her eat her ow=
n crap!...

            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: Nar=
rator 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, =
February 16, 2002 5:11 AM
            Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig=
 it, Chivtrons?...


            Chop Shop: (GASP!) Wouldn't that make me a=
 dung beetle? I don't know, it'd be pretty cool, actually.

            Bar=
rage was hit by a shot from the base. He totally ignored Apocalypse and aim=
ed a gun at the shields. He was hit by another shot, but then fired 2 missi=
les at the base. Ransack holds his hand out and a charge comes out of his w=
rist. He pressed a button as it lands in his hand, and then throws it at th=
e base. It's set to explode when the timer ticks down. Venom was hit by 3 s=
hots from the base and gasps.

            Bombshell: Hee hee hee! What sho=
uld I make her do? Dance!

            He sends out a signal to the shell i=
n Periwinkle's head to make her dance...

              ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
              From: *Orchid* 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
              Sent: Saturday, February 16, 2002 3:51 AM
           =
   Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you dig it, Chivtrons?...


              =
OOC: Damn it! Who controls the base? Cause whoever does, reply to my attack=
s! I'm tired of being ignored! And yet everything seems to go on very casua=
lly. Why? Cause I'm not popular like Airly? And Airly, it is McGowan's team=
! Not Barrymore! And it's Barrymore with an I...

              IC:

      =
        Periwinkle stops struggling and stares into space after the cerebro=
 shell was inserted in her head. She was now Bombshell's slave...

        =
      McGowan swiftly dodges the autoguns shots. Virgo, Birdbot and Papertr=
on are struck by the several shots but hold their ground. On the other hand=
, Barrymore, Lee and Depp dodged the shots. Barrymore with a sidejump, Lee =
with and duck & roll and Depp with a high jump. She remembered that althoug=
h Pink was dead, they still had Brown.

              McGowan: I hope you S=
hitrons know that there is going to be another death over here! Your precio=
us little Shitron is about to suffer!

              Depp passes Brown to M=
cGowan. McGowan first watches Virgo fire off 8 shots, Barrymore fire off 6 =
shots, Lee fire off 2 fireballs, Depp fire off 4 plasma shots, Birdbot fire=
 2 more grenades and Papertron fire off 10 shots. McGowan smiled, watching =
all of the shots go sailing towards the Chivtron base. McGowan turns to the=
 Insecticons.

              McGowan: Hey, if someone doesn't come out soon=
, would you mind eating this guy?

              Brown eyes widened and hop=
ed that the Insecticons would do something less brutal...

                =
----- Original Message ----- 
                From: Airshadow Nightlight 
 =
               To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, =
February 16, 2002 1:50 AM
                Subject: Re: Insecticons. Can you=
 dig it, Chivtrons?...


                OOC: Regarding Rudra's ooc's post =
I'll post with Aerotaur. 

                Windlord/Aerotaur/Nightlight::: =


                "Stop little one!!" said Aerotaur while he took at Trinit=
y and left her in Nightlight's arms. 

                "But I wanna help, u=
ncle Aerotaur"said Trinity. 

                "No yet"replied Aerotaur  who=
 turned on the base's defences. 

                The external defences tur=
ned on and fired against the Insecticons and Barrimore's team.
